posts.postText: When I open the maps menu, there are only 4 jail maps to pick from, compared to the many more that were previously available.  Will they be added again in the near future, or are we forced to play or 4 maps FOREVER?
Yeah i get what your saying, but personally, i love these maps. If they add new maps, it would be great.

alright, and the escape map, the version you can actually escape in, you need to put the couch on top again. the vent is to easy to go threw, and make an escape.

Edit: On top of the vent that is Right in the cell area, Back wall.
